name: asafoetida
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a sticky, bitter, strong-smelling liquid made from the root of a plant, or a powder made from this liquid, used especially in South Asian cookery: I added green chillies, asafoetida, and grated coconut to the mixture.
More examplesFewer examplesAsafoetida goes well with most vegetables and legumes.Add asafoetida, cumin seeds, chilli powder, and coriander to the oil.Asafoetida is often used together with cinnamon, cardamom, and cloves.The pungent asafoetida helps to create a wonderful taste.
